Title: Site Reliability Engineering – More Evolution of Automation
Description: We're going back in time, or is it forward?, as we continue learning about Google's automation evolution, while Allen doesn't like certain beers, Joe is a Zacker™, and Michael poorly assumes that UPSes work best when plugged in.

Title: Tiny Core Linux 13.0 is a full Linux desktop in 22 MB #Linux
Description: Most Linux-based operating systems are fairly large — usually well over a full gigabyte in size for the base install image. Tiny Core Linux, which clocks in at a svelte 22 MB download, just release…
